duties_responsibilities.duty: Efficiently procure raw materials and components based on price and schedule demand ensuring delivery prior to the production start date.
Research and maintain working relationships with suppliers through regular communication.
Monitor supply levels and collaborate with suppliers to maintain delivery schedules.
Track and provide status reports on delivery schedules, supply shortages, and other possible issues that could impact production.
Assist in the preparation and issuance of purchase orders (POs) and reconcile/close out POs and procurement transactions using the ERP system.
Troubleshoot reconciliation issues with the internal planning/procurement team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain, Business, or a related field
